sentences.sentence: The value of America and Japan decrease greatly between 2010 and 2013.
There is an unusual drop in 2012 of America.

sentences.sentence: The value of America and Japan decrease greatly between 2010 and 2013.
There is an unusual drop in 2012 of America.
